type.description:
Recurrence meeting types:
`1` - Daily
`2` - Weekly
`3` - Monthly

repeat_interval.description: The interval at which the meeting should repeat. For a daily meeting, the maximum interval can be 90 days. For a weekly meeting, the maximum interval period is 12 weeks. For a monthly meeting, the maximum interval is 3 months.

weekly_days.description:
Days on which the meeting repeats.
`1` - Sunday
`2` - Monday
`3` - Tuesday
`4` - Wednesday
`5` - Thursday
`6` - Friday
`7` - Saturday

monthly_day.description: Day in the month the meeting is to be scheduled. The value ranges from 1 to 31.

monthly_week_day.description:
The day of the week on which a meeting recurs each month.
`1` - Sunday
`2` - Monday
`3` - Tuesday
`4` - Wednesday
`5` - Thursday
`6` - Friday
`7` - Saturday

end_times.description: Shows how many times a meeting has been scheduled to recur. The maximum number of times that a meeting can recur is 50.

end_date_time.description: The date and time until which the meeting recurs.

monthly_week.description: The week on which a meeting recurs each month.
